title: ApplicationSoftwareVersion (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK ApplicationSoftwareVersion EXTENDS BACnet.BACnetServerPluginBase
Set Device.Application_Software_Version at BACnetServer.StartBACnetStack to ensure proper property value
even if BACnetServer device description was updated (which changes the default but keeps the value) and/or the property was configured persistent.
Set also Device.Protocol_Revision and Device.Protocol_Version.
Properties:
Name
Methods:
PostStartBACnetStack
Structure:
Name (Property)
PostStartBACnetStack (Method)
